text: In the 2023 FIFA Women's World Cup, Group D is a part of the tournament where teams compete against each other. It will happen from July 20th to July 30th, 2023. The teams in this group are England, Haiti, Denmark and China. The two best teams from this group will move on to the next round, called the round of 16. == Teams == Draw position Team Pot Confederation Method of qualification Date of qualification Finals champions 30 January 2022 8th 2019 Runners-up (1999) 15 14 Notes == Standings == In the round of 16: * The winners of Group D will advance to play the runners-up of Group B. * The runners-up of Group
